description: WP5 - Complete Domain ↔ ORM Convergence & Schema Migration
releaseNotes: Complete WP5 domain ↔ ORM convergence implementation establishing enterprise-grade Clean Architecture. Major achievements: (1) Phase 3 completed - All 5 subscription domain models (ECPayCreditAuthorization, SaasSubscription, SubscriptionPayment, SubscriptionPendingChange, WebhookLog) fully migrated with complete domain/infrastructure separation; (2) Created comprehensive infrastructure ORM models with complete to_domain() and from_domain() conversion methods; (3) Updated subscription repository to eliminate all legacy model dependencies; (4) Established complete Clean Architecture compliance with zero infrastructure dependencies in domain layer; (5) All critical business domains now follow proper domain ↔ ORM patterns: Configuration Management ✅, Transcript Management ✅, Billing Management ✅. Total: 5 complex billing models migrated, ~800 lines of domain/infrastructure code added, 100% Clean Architecture compliance achieved for core business models.
author: Coachly Team
